name: AXBrailleMap
desc: A representation of a two-dimensional braille display.

items.name: var dimensions: CGSize
items.desc: The number of pins in each dimension of the braille display.

items.name: func setHeight(Float, at: CGPoint)
items.desc: Sets the height of an individual pin on the braille display.

items.name: func height(at: CGPoint) -> Float
items.desc: Retrieves the height of an individual pin on the braille display.

items.name: subscript(CGPoint) -> Float
items.desc: Accesses the height of an individual pin on the braille display.

items.name: func present(CGImage)
items.desc: Converts the data from the image you specify into the braille map.
